subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: Ryan Lochte of the United States and Kirsty Coventry of Zimbabwe set world records in the short-course world championships in Manchester, England. Lochte finished the 100-meter individual medley in 51.25 seconds. Coventry swam the women’s 200-meter individual medley in 2 minutes 6.13 seconds.
